sentences.sContent: The military initially focused on 'remote viewing', the scientific term for clairvoyance and extrasensory perception (or ESP).
sentences.sContent_eng: The military initially focused on 'remote viewing', the scientific term for clairvoyance and extrasensory perception (or ESP).
sentences.sCn: 军方最初致力于开发“遥视”能力，这是千里眼和超感知觉的科学术语（或称ESP）。

remMethod.val: clair(看作clear， 清楚) + voy(看) + ance → 看得很清楚 → 超人的洞察力

trans.tranCn: 透视, 洞察力, 千里眼
trans.tranOther: the alleged power of perceiving things beyond the natural range of the senses
